```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  comment = NA,
  fig.align = "center"
)
# options(scipen = 999)

styler::tidyverse_style()
```
